tcma/assur/P282266
20 immerū ina ūmu 17-KAM₂ Marduk-bela-uṣur mār tar-re-x  1 immeru ana bāb Aššur ana ša-lu-x-ti 1 immeru ana bāb {d}x 1 immeru ana abulle asâte 1 immeru ana tisare 1 immeru ana bāb Šeruya 1 immeru ana abulle erê tibēra 1 immeru ana nupāre ša Budaya 1 immeru 3 gibēre sīrāšê 1 immeru Adad-apla-iddina x 7 ana nēše 3 immerū ana kirê 3 immerū ana niqiāte ana Marat-Ane 4 immerū ša-kurultie 1 immerū ana ūmu 19-KAM₂  napharu 20 immerū nāmurtu ša Marduk-bela-uṣur ša Mutta ana nupāre u abullāte upaqqidūni ana lā mašāʾe šaṭir Qarratu ūmu 18-KAM₂ līmu Sin-šeya
